protein.specific_function: Binds phospholipid vesicles containing phosphatidylinositol 3-phosphate and participates in endosomal trafficking

reference.reference_text: Mu FT, Callaghan JM, Steele-Mortimer O, Stenmark H, Parton RG, Campbell PL, McCluskey J, Yeo JP, Tock EP, Toh BH: EEA1, an early endosome-associated protein. EEA1 is a conserved alpha-helical peripheral membrane protein flanked by cysteine "fingers" and contains a calmodulin-binding IQ motif. J Biol Chem. 1995 Jun 2;270(22):13503-11.
